Daniel Clifford

Verified Graduate

I received a job offer min-course, and the subjects I learned were current, if not more so, in the company I joined. I honestly feel I got every penny's worth.

"I was an EMT for many years before I joined the bootcamp. I've been looking to make a transition and have heared some people who had an amazing experience here. I signed up for the free into course and found it incredibly fun! I enrolled shortly there after. The next 12 weeks was the best - and most grueling - time of my life. Sience completing the course, I've sucessfully switched, working as a Software Engineer at a VR startup."

Jonathan Walters

Verified Graduate

The team was very supportive and kept me motivated.

"I started as a total newbie with vritually no coding skills. I now work as a mobile engineer fot a big company. This was one of the best investements I've made in myself."

Kira Whittle

Verified Graduate

Such a life-changing experience. Higly recommended!

"Before joining the bootcamp, I've never written a line of code. I needed some structure from proffessionals who can help me learn programming step by step. I was encuraged to enroll by a former student of theirs who can only say wonderfull things about the program. The entire cirriculum and staff did not dissapoint. They were very hands-off and I never had to wait long for assistance. The agile team project, in particular, was outstanding. It took my learning to the next level in a way that no tutorial could ever have. In fact, I've often referred to it during interviews as an example of my developement expierience. It certinly helped me land a job as a full-stack developer after recieving multiple offers. 100% recommend!"

Jeanette Harmon

Verified Graduate

An overall wonderfull and rewarding experience.

"Thank you for the wonderful experience! I now have a job I really enjoy, and make a good living while doing something I love."

Patrick Abrams

Verified Graduate

Awesome teaching support from TAs who did the bootcamp themeselves. Getting guidance from them and learning from their experiences was easy.

"The staff seems genuinely concerned about my progress which I find really refreshing. The program gave me the confidence necessary to be able to go out in the world and present myself as a capable junior developer. The standard is above the rest. You will get the personal attention you need from an incredible community of smart and amazing people."
